From the deal section using custom cards we can open the custom window which shows the list of all the available products and also add then to the deal line items … we can manage this using the custom properties and coded workflows

Hi all! I am working on creating a live updating scoreboard for our sales team in office, and was sent to this for ideas and help. any ideas on where to start?
these are the criteria that im working on displaying:
Left hand side team members names
Total completed demos
Current week completed
Mtd complete
And same week of previous month
Accumulated 2 weeks vs same 2 weeks previous month
Are you sure that is a good idea? I mean, there is a lot of pressure on each team member when everything is so transparent, right?
maybe Databox could be a good solution for a live Dashboard
the reports are already open for everyone to view, its just creating a walk by visual now

Hi everyone, I am trying to create a collections process via HubSpot.

I need to send whatsapp and emails to clients every month automatically to ensure our collections process runs smoothly. However, I can only send whatsapp messages via a workflow that is contact level. The issue with this is, once the contact enrolls in the contact once, then I will have to manually re-add them every time in order for them to then again receive the same messages the next month.

Right now, my only solution is to make an workflow that is invoice level- however that restricts me to only sending emails - which are definitely not as effective for collectioins.

Let me know your guys thoughts here or if you have any solutions!
I have already went to support which directed me here to try to solve this issue

Hello guys
Looking for a way to add  a ticket id reference in an email and  associate the reply to that mail  with an existing ticket

Yup I know HubDB dynamic pages add to sitemap.xml but it doesn't look like pages made from custom objects currently do. They'll need to address this at some point as it looks like HubSpot wants us to be using custom objects for dynamic content moving forward.
The new nav seems to be popping up for people that are creating new HubSpot accounts. <https://www.reddit.com/r/HubSpot/comments/191t60i/setting_up_HubSpot_for_a_new_company_anyone_else/>
Does anyone know if it's possible to use a different property that is not a primary display property as the Unique value/deduplication mechanism for custom objects? for example an ID ?
